text:
With Only A Few Days Left For The D-Day, Bride-To-Be Priyanka Chopra’s Mumbai House Is All Decked Up
With Only A Few Days Left For The D-Day, Bride-To-Be Priyanka Chopra’s Mumbai House Is All Decked Up
Our Desi girl is all set to walk down the aisle with the love of her life Nick Jonas. Priyanka Chopra is on cloud nine because the most beautiful phase of her life is about to begin. After wrapping up the shoot of The Sky Is Pink in Delhi, Priyanka Chopra along with her bae Nick Jonas arrived in Mumbai, ahead of their wedding.
Also Read: After Partying Together, Priyanka Chopra & Nick Jonas Arrive In Mumbai Ahead Of Their Grand Wedding
Also Read: We Want Someone To Hold Our Hands Just The Way Nick Jonas Does With His Fiance Priyanka Chopra
And just like how NickYanka is beaming with happiness, Priyanka Chopra’s Mumbai house is all lit up too. The festivities are about to begin. After Deepika Padukone and Ranveer Singh, it’s time for Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas to tie the knot.

Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas’ wedding celebrations will reportedly kick-off on Nov 29 and continue till Dec 3. Priyanka and Nick will tie the knot twice in Hindu and Christian ceremonies on Dec 2 and Dec 3 reportedly. The couple will host two receptions thereafter, one in Delhi and the other in Mumbai.
title: With Only A Few Days Left For The D-Day, Bride-To-Be Priyanka Chopra’s Mumbai House Is All Decked Up
